author: jcai19
message:
[XLA:Python] Add nanobind binding for absl::Status

PiperOrigin-RevId: 837301178

files.patch:
@@ -617,6 +617,19 @@ cc_library(
     ],
 )
 
+cc_library(
+    name = "nb_status",
+    hdrs = ["nb_status.h"],
+    compatible_with = [],
+    copts = ["-fexceptions"],
+    features = ["-use_header_modules"],
+    visibility = internal_visibility([":friends"]),
+    deps = [
+        "@com_google_absl//absl/status",
+        "@nanobind",
+    ],
+)
+
 cc_library(
     name = "aggregate_profile",
     srcs = ["aggregate_profile.cc"],
